body_html:
great. I'd consider the issue closed then.
We will slowly and eventually converge to numpy for all of our workloads. Right now we are faster for some workloads on CPU, but as you showed slower for other.

body:
great. I'd consider the issue closed then.
We will slowly and eventually converge to numpy for all of our workloads. Right now we are faster for some workloads on CPU, but as you showed slower for other.
